ai.summary: A short, easy 2.2 km circular walk in the UK suitable for families and casual walkers. The route loops back to the start along well-marked paths with gentle gradients.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-maintained paths composed of gravel, grass, and compact soil. Expect occasional mud after rain and a few uneven or slightly rocky sections; some routes may include damp grass or puddles near edges.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather forecast and daylight hours before you go. Wear sturdy, grippy footwear and dress for layering; the UK's weather can change quickly. Stay on marked paths, watch for slippery surfaces when wet, and take care near any water or exposed edges. Bring water, a light layer, a map or phone with offline maps, a small first aid kit, and snacks. Keep children and pets under supervision and know how to contact local emergency services if needed.
recommended_gear: Map or smartphone with offline maps
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn is ideal for this short hike; winter visits are fine but expect rain, mud, and reduced daylight.

seo.title: Circular Walk – Easy 2.2 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover a short, easy 2.2 km circular walk in the UK. Family-friendly route on well-marked paths with gentle gradients, safety tips, gear guidance, and best seasons.
